statements: SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_data;
SELECT id, label FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE label='speech';
SELECT id, audio_file_path FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE id=1;
SELECT label, created_at FROM labeled_audio_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE audio_file_path LIKE 'path%';
SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE label = 'speech' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, audio_file_path, label FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE audio_file_path LIKE '%.mp3';
SELECT label, COUNT(*) AS label_count FROM labeled_audio_data GROUP BY label ORDER BY label_count DESC;
SELECT id, audio_file_path, label, created_at FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE label IN ('music', 'speech') ORDER BY audio_file_path ASC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_data;
SELECT audio_id, label FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE label='speech';
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM speech_recognition_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT audio_id, label FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE audio_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE label='music' ORDER BY audio_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE label = 'cat';
SELECT audio_id, label FROM labeled_audio_data ORDER BY audio_id DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, accuracy FROM speech_recognition_models WHERE accuracy >= 0.8;
SELECT label, COUNT(*) FROM labeled_audio_data GROUP BY label HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT audio_id, label FROM labeled_audio_data WHERE label LIKE '%dog%' ORDER BY audio_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audio_data;
SELECT audio_id, label FROM audio_data WHERE audio_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT model_name, trained_by FROM models WHERE model_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM models WHERE trained_by = 'John Smith';
SELECT audio_id, label FROM audio_data ORDER BY audio_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM audio_data WHERE label = 'music' OR label = 'podcast';
SELECT model_id, trained_by FROM models ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM recordings WHERE label = 'Speech' AND duration > 60 ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT model_name, created_at FROM models WHERE created_by = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, model_id, audio_id, predicted_label FROM model_predictions WHERE confidence > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT recording_id, label, duration FROM recordings WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT model_name, created_by FROM models ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(recording_id) AS num_recordings FROM recordings GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_recordings > 5;
SELECT model_name, predicted_label, confidence FROM models m JOIN model_predictions mp ON m.model_id = mp.model_id WHERE confidence > 0.9;
SELECT * FROM labeled_audio_files LIMIT 10
SELECT file_name, label FROM labeled_audio_files WHERE label='speech'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_accuracy FROM models ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM models WHERE model_type='classification'
SELECT file_id, file_name, label FROM labeled_audio_files WHERE label='positive';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_accuracy FROM models WHERE model_type='classification' ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles JOIN users ON user_roles.user_id = users.user_id WHERE role='admin';
SELECT result_id, audio_file_id, result FROM model_results WHERE result LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY result_id ASC;
